data.quote: The Way Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Don’t Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: If You Are Working On Something That You Really Care About, You Don’t Have To Be Pushed. The Vision Pulls You.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: People Who Are Crazy Enough To Think They Can Change The World, Are The Ones Who Do.
data.author: Rob Siltanen

data.quote: We May Encounter Many Defeats But We Must Not Be Defeated.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: Knowing Is Not Enough; We Must Apply. Wishing Is Not Enough; We Must Do.
data.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

data.quote: Imagine Your Life Is Perfect In Every Respect; What Would It Look Like?
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: We Generate Fears While We Sit. We Overcome Them By Action.
data.author: Dr. Henry Link

data.quote: Whether You Think You Can Or Think You Can’t, You’re Right.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: Security Is Mostly A Superstition. Life Is Either A Daring Adventure Or Nothing.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: The Man Who Has Confidence In Himself Gains The Confidence Of Others.
data.author: Hasidic Proverb

data.quote: The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: Creativity Is Intelligence Having Fun.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: What You Lack In Talent Can Be Made Up With Desire, Hustle And Giving 110% All The Time.
data.author: Don Zimmer

data.quote: Do What You Can With All You Have, Wherever You Are.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
data.author: C.S. Lewis

data.quote: To See What Is Right And Not Do It Is A Lack Of Courage.
data.author: Confucious

data.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: If you’re going through hell keep going.
data.author: Winston Churchill
